resources.string:
12G Fast Speed Internet 
 THANK YOU EVERYONE! 
 This wouldn't be possible without you! 
 Thanks to all translators that helped! 
 Your translations rock!

 Thanks to the TextDrawable library! 
 Thank you all who encouraged me to keep on going! 
 Vlad Todosin - BeHe ExploreR developer
